alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Shackelford; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 08 at 2:48PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Callahan, southeastern Jones, southern Shackelford and northeastern Taylor Counties through 345 PM CST... At 248 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamby, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abilene, Albany, Lueders, Nugent, Hamby, Impact, Mccarty Lake, Big Country Baptist Assembly and Lake Fort Phantom Hill. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 284 and 298. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
